DOC.brief_summary: A Phase 1b/2 , Randomized , Double-blind , Placebo-Controlled , Multiple Oral Dose Escalation Study Assess Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetics ITI-007 Healthy Geriatric Volunteers Geriatric Patients Dementia
DOC.brief_title: Study ITI-007 Healthy Geriatric Volunteers Geriatric Patients With Dementia
DOC.criteria: Part 1 Healthy geriatric volunteer MMSE score > = 26 screen BMI 19.0 40.0 kg/m2 minimum body weight 50 kg screen Part 2 Geriatric patient clinical diagnosis dementia MMSE score < 26 screen BMI 19.0 40.0 kg/m2 minimum body weight 50 kg screen Any clinically significant illness within 6 month screen Any history cancer within last 5 year History Hepatitis B C infection elevate ALT , AST bilirubin upper limit normal level Any subject consider imminent danger others
